code: import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import pic from'../profilePic.png';import NavBar from'./navigationBar.js';function getHome(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:HomeCSS,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:bodyCSS,id:"Body",children:[getImg(),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{margin:'20px',textAlign:"center"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{fontSize:"60px"},children:"Hi, I'm Eric!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:paragraphCSS,children:"I'm a software architect who recently graduated with a B.S. in computer science from the University of California San Diego."})]})]})]});}function getImg(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:pic,className:"Profile-pic",alt:"profile pic",width:"200px",height:"200px",style:{margin:"50px",float:"left"}});}function getSocial(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{listStyle:"none outside",style:socialCSS,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{style:socialItemBoxCSS,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://www.linkedin.com/in/eric-wei-09b36b141/",style:socialLinkCSS,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{style:iconCSS})})})});}var socialCSS={margin:"24px 0",padding:"0",fontSize:"30px",textShadow:"0px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, .8)",display:"block"};var socialItemBoxCSS={display:"inline-block",margin:"0 15px",padding:"0",lineHeight:"18px"};var socialLinkCSS={color:"#fff",textDecoration:"none",outline:"0"};var iconCSS={display:"inline-block",fontFamily:"FontAwesome",fontStyle:"normal",fontWeight:"normal",lineHeight:"1"};var HomeCSS={backgroundColor:"#282c34",minHeight:"100vh",fontSize:"calc(10px + 2vmin)"};var bodyCSS={display:"flex",flexDirection:"row",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"center",color:"white",margin:"175px 75px"};var paragraphCSS={color:"#A8A8A8",textShadow:"0px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, .5)",font:"16px/1.9em 'LibreBaskerville Regular', serif",maxWidth:"410px"};export default getHome;
